20110121010021.000|20110121010022.000|CC1|TEXAS.

20110121010025.000|20110121010026.000|CC1|DAYLIGHT, LEAVES HOME DOWN THE  
20110121010026.000|20110121010027.000|CC1|STREET TO A LITTLE FRIEND'S     
20110121010027.000|20110121010027.000|CC1|HOUSE.                          
20110121010027.000|20110121010031.000|CC1|SHE'S NEVER SEEN AGAIN.         
20110121010031.000|20110121010032.000|CC1|BLOODHOUNDS SCAN THE            
20110121010032.000|20110121010034.000|CC1|NEIGHBORHOOD AND A LOCAL MOTEL. 
20110121010034.000|20110121010036.000|CC1|POLICE COMB THAT SURVEILLANCE   
20110121010036.000|20110121010037.000|CC1|VIDEO.                          
20110121010037.000|20110121010039.000|CC1|NO SIGN OF HAILEY.              
20110121010039.000|20110121010041.000|CC1|IN POLICE INTERVIEWS, THE       
20110121010041.000|20110121010043.000|CC1|BOYFRIEND SAYS, QUOTE, WHAT A   
20110121010043.000|20110121010044.000|CC1|GOOD GIRL HAILEY IS.            
20110121010044.000|20110121010048.000|CC1|THEN DOES A 180, CLAIMING THE   
20110121010048.000|20110121010051.000|CC1|13-YEAR-OLD LITTLE GIRL IS      
20110121010051.000|20110121010051.000|CC1|PROMISCUOUS.

20110121010054.000|20110121010056.000|CC1|HAILEY'S GRANDMOTHER FEARS      
20110121010056.000|20110121010058.000|CC1|MOMMY'S LIVE-IN MOLESTED        
20110121010058.000|20110121010101.000|CC1|13-YEAR-OLD HAILEY, THEN MURDERS
20110121010101.000|20110121010104.000|CC1|HER WHEN SHE THREATENS TO TELL. 
20110121010104.000|20110121010106.000|CC1|EERIE SLASHER VIDEOS SURFACE.   
20110121010106.000|20110121010110.000|CC1|MOMMY'S LIVE-IN WEARING A BLACK 
20110121010110.000|20110121010115.000|CC1|HOOD, BLACK S & M MASK, ACTING  
20110121010115.000|20110121010118.000|CC1|OUT SLICE-AND-DICE SCENARIOS,   
20110121010118.000|20110121010119.000|CC1|APRON FOR CATCHING BLOOD.       
20110121010119.000|20110121010121.000|CC1|STRAIGHT OUT OF A HORROR MOVIE. 
20110121010121.000|20110121010123.000|CC1|OH, AND APPARENTLY SMOKING POT. 
20110121010123.000|20110121010126.000|CC1|WE HAVE THE VIDEO.              
20110121010126.000|20110121010129.000|CC1|AND LIVE-IN BOYFRIEND SEAN      
20110121010129.000|20110121010131.000|CC1|ADKINS SPEAKS OUT CLAIMING HE   
20110121010131.000|20110121010133.000|CC1|PRAYS FOR HAILEY'S RETURN.      
20110121010133.000|20110121010136.000|CC1|BUT STILL, TO THIS HOUR, NO ONE 
20110121010136.000|20110121010138.000|CC1|CONFIRMS HE'S AT CHURCH ON HIS  
20110121010138.000|20110121010139.000|CC1|KNEES THIS PAST SUNDAY.         
20110121010139.000|20110121010142.000|CC1|COPS SEIZE HAILEY'S BED SHEETS, 
20110121010142.000|20110121010144.000|CC1|PERFORMING FORENSIC TESTS TO    
20110121010144.000|20110121010146.000|CC1|DETERMINE IF A MOLESTATION OR   
20110121010146.000|20110121010148.000|CC1|MURDER OCCURRED THERE.
